Key Match Events: Evidence Makgopa scored a goal in the 57th minute
Teboho Mokoena scored a goal in the 90'+5' minute with a superb late free kick
Sofyan Amrabat was sent off late on for a professional foul
Pre-Game Insights: Morocco were among the favourites at the tournament
Morocco's continental curse continues and they remain without a Cup of Nations title since 1976
Post-Match Reflections: Morocco coach Walid Regragui took full responsibility for the loss
South Africa players celebrated a famous win and a quarterfinals spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in the muggy heat of the Laurent Pokou Stadium
Morocco missed the attacking talents of injured playmaker Hakim Ziyech
Others: South Africa will play Cape Verde in the quarterfinals in Yamoussoukro on Saturday
South Africa have endured much hardship in continental competition over the last few decades
